Restaurants.RestaurantDescription: A favorite stop for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, Chick-fil-A offers premium chicken strips, sandwiches, salads, wraps, waffle fries, and more.

This all-you-care-to-eat venue provides 8 different stations and features exhibition cooking where fresh, quality ingredients are prepared right in Southside is located in the center of campus and features home-style American cuisine.

Panera offers a wide array of pastries and baked goods, such as croissants, bagels, cookies, scones, muffins and brownies. These, along with Panera's artisan breads, are typically baked before dawn by an on-staff baker.
Build your own pizza, selecting from a wide array of fresh toppings, or choose a signature pizza. Each artisanal pizza is custom-crafted and then fast-fired for three minutes in a blazing-hot oven.
Easygoing, Southern-style BBQ chain with blues music in the background & memorabilia on the walls
American casual restaurant which features primarily burgers and hand-dipped milkshakes.
